msquerybuilderbackend.business

Class AlertBusiness

  • java.lang.Object
    • msquerybuilderbackend.business.AlertBusiness

  • @Component
public class AlertBusiness
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for all activities with neo4j database regarding the entity Alert.
    Author:
    Martin

    • Method Detail

      • createAlert

        public java.lang.Long createAlert(Alert alert)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        checks whether the name of the given alert already exits and returns 0L if true, otherwise the types of the alerts are tested and the alert saved
        Parameters:
        alert - is the alert to create in the neo4j database
        Returns:
        the neo4j id of the new created alert
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getNameList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNameList()
        method which generates a List of all names of alerts
        Returns:
        a list of all names of alerts as Strings

      • updateAlert

        public Alert updateAlert(java.lang.String alertId,
                         Alert al)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        method which updates a given alert in the neo4j database
        Parameters:
        alertId - is the id of the alert to be updated; can be the unique name or the neo4j ID
        al - is the alert object with the new content
        Returns:
        the updated alert
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when the types given in the alert are not true (i.e. given type integer but the value is a string)

      • getAllAlerts

        public java.util.List<Alert> getAllAlerts()
        method which queries all alerts from the neo4j database
        Returns:
        a list with all alerts which are in the neo4j database

      • getAlert

        public Alert getAlert(java.lang.String alertId)
        method which queries a certain alert from the neo4j database
        Parameters:
        alertId - is the id from the alert to look for; can be the neo4j ID or the unique name
        Returns:
        an alert object with content of the in the neo4j database found alert

      • executeAlert

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.neo4j.ogm.model.Result> executeAlert(java.lang.String alertId)
        method which queries a certain alert and executes it in the neo4j database
        Parameters:
        alertId - is the id of the alert to be executed; can be the unique name or the neo4j ID
        Returns:
        a neo4j result of the alert's executed query

      • deleteAlert

        public void deleteAlert(java.lang.String alertId)
        method which deletes a certain alert in the neo4j database
        Parameters:
        alertId - is the id of the alert to be deleted; can be the neo4j ID or the unique name

      • executeAllAlerts

        public void executeAllAlerts()
        method which executesAllAlerts; is needed for the periodic execution of alerts

      • shouldAddToMessageBuffer

        public boolean shouldAddToMessageBuffer(java.lang.String Ps_actualValue,
                                        Alert P_alert)
        method which checks if an alert constraint was reached and therefore if the message should be added to the buffer
        Returns:
        true or false

      • checkCompareToValue

        public boolean checkCompareToValue(int Pi_compareToValue,
                                   java.lang.String Ps_filterType)
        Compares the compareTo return value with the filterType from alert. This method checks whether the alert threshold has been reached.
        Parameters:
        Pi_compareToValue - is the compareTo return value
        Ps_filterType - is the filterType from alert
        Returns:
        if the alert threshold has been reached

      • sendEmail

        public void sendEmail(java.lang.String Ps_text,
                      java.lang.String Ps_empfaenger,
                      java.lang.String Ps_alertName)
        Send a mail with a specific text to a specific recipient. This method realizes the email notification for the alerts.
        Parameters:
        Ps_text - is a part of the mail text. Should show which values trigger the alert.
        Ps_empfaenger - is the email address of the alert
        Ps_alertName - is the name of triggered alert
